title: Suggestio Configuration
description: Configuration for the Suggestio VS Code extension

activeProvider.description: The ID of the provider to use (must match a key in the 'providers' object).

enableInlineCompletion.description: Whether to enable inline code completion. Defaults to true.

model.description: The name of the model to use (e.g., 'gpt-4', 'gemini-pro').

apiKey.description: The API key for the provider. Can be a literal string or a placeholder like '${MY_ENV_VAR}'.

endpoint.description: The API endpoint URL (required for OpenAI-compatible providers, usually ignored for Gemini).

words.description: A list of specific words to always anonymize.

sensitiveData.description: Heuristic settings for detecting and anonymizing sensitive data (like keys or passwords) based on entropy.

allowedEntropy.description: Entropy threshold. Tokens with normalized Shannon entropy (H / log2(length)) higher than this value will be anonymized. Values range from 0 to 1 (e.g., > 0.85 indicates high randomness).

minLength.description: Minimum length a token must have to be considered for entropy analysis.
